mapper.select: SELECT q.question_no AS questionNo, b.branch_no AS branchNo, b.branch_name AS branchName, q.isSecret AS isSecret, q.question_title AS questionTitle, c.customer_no AS customerNo, c.customer_id AS customerId, q.createdate AS createdate, q.updatedate AS updatedate FROM question q JOIN customer c ON q.customer_no = c.customer_no JOIN branch b ON q.branch_no = b.branch_no ORDER BY q.question_no DESC LIMIT #{beginRow}, #{rowPerPage};

SELECT q.question_no AS questionNo, b.branch_name AS branchName, c.customer_id AS customerId, q.question_title AS questionTitle, q.question_content AS questionContent, q.createdate AS createdate, q.updatedate AS updatedate FROM question q JOIN customer c ON q.customer_no = c.customer_no JOIN branch b ON q.branch_no = b.branch_no WHERE q.question_no = #{questionNo};
SELECT b.branch_level AS branchLevel FROM branch b JOIN employee e ON b.branch_no = e.branch_no WHERE e.employee_no = #{employeeNo};
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO question( question_no, customer_no, branch_no, question_title, question_content, isSecret ) VALUES ( #{questionNo}, #{customerNo}, #{branchNo}, #{questionTitle}, #{questionContent}, #{isSecret} )
